Slovenia: Primož Trubar publishes the first books in Slovene, Catechismus and Abecedarium.
Malta: Andrea Doria and Claude de la Sengle, bailli of the French langue of the Knights, capture and massacre the population of Mahdia, in Tunisia. (to September)
Colombia: Hernando de Santana founded the village of Valle de Upar
Foundation of Ibagué by Andres Lopez de Galarza
China: The Mongol chieftain Altan Khan burned and looted the Ming capital Beijing and its suburbs.
Chile: Pedro de Valdivia founds Concepción del Nuevo Extremo, now known as Concepción.
